name: online-store
description: **Authors:** - Erik Stor√•s Sommer - Adrian Tokle Storset - Mats Nome Sommervold, s341829

scripts.up: DB_GATEWAY=mongodb DB_URI=<protocol>://<username>:<password>@<host>:<port>/<database>?authSource=admin DB_PROTOCOL=mongodb DB_HOST=mongodb DB_PORT=27017 DB_NAME=production DB_USERNAME=root DB_PASSWORD=rootpassword PORT=3000 AUTO_PORT=false ACTIONS_TO_LOG='server, mode, fatal, tips, database, error' ERRORS_TO_LOG=all TRACEBACKS_TO_LOG=all docker-compose up --build
